com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IServiceManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceManager
public interface IServiceManager

The interface for the CodeService class The code service class provides remote services to manipuate code objects.

Author:
Sajid and Rema / Michelle Bachler

Clean up the Service instances when the application is closed.

Parameters:
sessionId, - the id of the session running when the application was closed.
sUserID, - the id of the user whose was logged in when the application was closed.
